plugin.name: ðŸ“¦ Filer
plugin.description: Help file (move) the current paragraph, selected paragraphs, or heading and its section, to different notes. Please see details for more, err, details.
plugin.author: jgclark

plugin.commands.name: nns
plugin.commands.description: New note from selection (and leave link to it in its place)

plugin.preferences.title: Add date backlinks?
plugin.preferences.description: If true, adds date backlinks on the moved paragraph(s) when moved from a daily note.

plugin.preferences.title: Use extended block definition?
plugin.preferences.description: Controls whether directly following paragaphs will take all following lines at same level until next empty line as well (true) or whether they have to be further indented (false; this is the default).

plugin.preferences.title: Where to add in section
plugin.preferences.description: Controls whether moved lines get inserted at the "start" or "end" of the chosen section.
